name: First National Bank of Altoona v. Automobile Finance Company, Appellant
name_abbreviation: First National Bank v. Automobile Finance Co.

judges: Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearne and Hughes, JJ.
parties: First National Bank of Altoona v. Automobile Finance Company, Appellant.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The decree of the court below is affirmed on the able opinion of Patterson, P. J. Costs to be paid by appellant.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Emanuel S. Leopold, of Scheeline é Leopold, for appellant.
casebody.head_matter:
First National Bank of Altoona v. Automobile Finance Company, Appellant.
Argued January 10,1944.
Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearne and Hughes, JJ.
Emanuel S. Leopold, of Scheeline é Leopold, for appellant.
Robert G. Haberstroh, for appellee.
March 20, 1944:
